## Data Dictionaries

* Document the data sources  
    + Include links when possible
* Code names
    + Be consistent with your group's style guide
* Brief description
* How missing values are handled
* Class of variable
* Possible categories or ranges
* Key variables
* Derived variables
    + Made from others, imputed, ...
* Other relevant information
